entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
